definitions.definition: An ancient city, which became the capital of Elam , the Persian Empire , the Seleucid Empire and the Parthian Empire , now known as Shush in modern-day Khuzestan Province , Iran .

main_definition: ( historical ) An ancient city, which became the capital of Elam , the Persian Empire , the Seleucid Empire and the Parthian Empire , now known as Shush in modern-day Khuzestan Province , Iran .
